Metadata: Chemistry of crustacean hormones that regulates growth and reproduction
"Recent Advances in Marine Biotechnology," Volume 1, Milton Fingerman, et al. (eds.), pp. 164-178, 1997.

The author reviews the chemistry and metabolism of the hormones involved in reproduction and the molt cycle of crustaceans. Discussion mainly deals with hormones that have been purified and identified from crustacean tissues.
